subject: Suits and Litigation (Civil)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The director of women’s athletics at the University of Texas testified that paying athletes for the use of their likenesses or allowing them to share in revenue was “incongruous” with the university’s approach to amateur sports.
snippet: The director of women’s athletics at the University of Texas testified that paying athletes for the use of their likenesses or allowing them to share in revenue was “incongruous” with the university’s approach to amateur sports.
